events.message: We have successfully received your application for the Software Engineer position. Our team will review your materials and be in touch soon.
Your application has been categorised under the Engineering department, specifically for the Software Engineer role you applied for.
A recruiter specialized in engineering hires has been assigned to your application to assist you through the interview process.
Your initial screening interview is completed. The recruiter mentioned you have great potential and will move you forward to technical rounds.
Thank you for your prompt response to the interview schedule. We're glad you're enthusiastic about continuing in the process.
Your technical interview has been scheduled for 2024-05-10 at 10:00 AM UTC. Prepare for coding challenges and system design questions.
The technical interview went very well. Interviewers praised your problem-solving skills and domain knowledge in software development.
We have scheduled your HR interview for 2024-05-15 at 2:00 PM UTC. This session will discuss cultural fit and company policies.
Your HR interview was successfully completed. The HR team appreciated your attitude and alignment with the company culture.
We are excited to extend you a formal offer to join our engineering team as a Software Engineer with a competitive compensation package.
Thank you for your positive feedback regarding the offer and interview experience. We are looking forward to your final decision.
You have accepted the offer. We're thrilled to welcome you onboard and will commence the onboarding process shortly.
Your onboarding process has started. You will receive all necessary resources and access credentials in the coming days.
The hiring process is now officially closed. We welcome you to the team and look forward to a successful career together.
